name: Kirito
description: The main protagonist of Sword Art Online.

name: Violet Evergarden
description: The titular character of Violet Evergarden, a former soldier who becomes an Auto Memories Doll.

name: Mitsuha Miyamizu
description: A high school girl from Itomori who swaps bodies with Taki.

name: Holo
description: A wolf deity who travels with Kraft Lawrence in Spice and Wolf.

name: Tanjiro Kamado
description: The main protagonist of Demon Slayer who becomes a demon slayer to avenge his family.

name: Loid Forger
description: A spy who adopts the persona of a psychiatrist and forms a fake family in Spy X Family.

name: Kyoko Hori
description: A popular and bright high school girl who falls in love with Izumi Miyamura in Horimiya.

name: Vladilena Miliz√©
description: She is more commonly known as Lena by her friends and as Handler One to her subordinates, and is an elite Republican soldier who rose to the rank of Major at the young age of 16. She is the commander of Shin and the Spearhead Squadron, whom she communicates with via the long-distance communication device known as the Para-RAID.

name: Akihito 'Sakaido' Narihisago
description: A detective who enters the subconscious minds of criminals in ID: Invaded.

name: Mai Sakurajima
description: A high school student who suffers from 'puberty syndrome' and appears as a bunny girl in Rascal Does Not Dream of Bunny Girl Senpai.

name: Makima
description: Makima is a Public Safety Devil Hunter.

name: David Martinez
description: A street kid who becomes an Edgerunner in Cyberpunk: Edgerunners.

name: Takina Inoue
description: A member of the Lycoris organization who works with Chisato Nishikigi in Lycoris Recoil.

name: Ai Hoshino
description: Ai Hoshino is the lead idol of B-Komachi, an idol group affiliated with Strawberry Productions. Before her idol work, she was a bumpkin who had no professionalism.

name: Rudeus Greyrat
description: The main protagonist of Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation, a 34-year-old NEET reincarnated in a fantasy world.

name: Sung Jin-Woo
description: The weakest hunter who becomes the strongest S-rank hunter in Solo Leveling.

name: Mashiro Shiina
description: A talented artist who lives in the Sakurasou dormitory in The Pet Girl of Sakurasou.
